trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理 <see cref="E:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlNodeEventHandler>委派，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> event occurs only when you call the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode>發生事件，只有當您呼叫<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> event, and deserializes an object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>，加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode>事件，並將物件還原序列化。
